            <tei-zone points="2578,1934 2607,1973 2607,2039 2569,2070 2607,2119 2607,2243 1990,2262 1959,2292 1986,2300 1986,2452 1978,2457 612,2437 622,2304 806,2272 816,2119 913,1973 1424,1954 1465,1905 2326,1888" id="eSc_textblock_4411276c" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2335,1623 2423,1662 2406,1701 2549,1767 2374,1815 1475,1796 1446,1737 1465,1613 1611,1604" id="eSc_textblock_8b4f9efa" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="573,3507 563,2683 612,2583 593,2547 1286,2531 1286,3531 1171,3531" id="eSc_textblock_b142b74c" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2046,2537 2033,3531 1307,3531 1307,2530" id="eSc_textblock_2aef91d9" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2199,3558 2250,3645 2462,3665 2501,3798 2569,3830 2607,3905 2114,3925 2065,3857 1212,3847 1144,3857 1103,3925 593,3925 583,3869 700,3818 700,3655 748,3633 738,3577 1032,3555 1286,3555 1307,3555 2164,3555" id="eSc_textblock_7d6330b8" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2578,3324 2637,3363 2627,3429 2087,3439 2063,3479 2063,3337" id="eSc_textblock_5fe584b5" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="917,1286 916,2020 1444,2020 1444,1286" id="eSc_textblock_ffd3c78d" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2116,2276 2093,3332 2658,3356 2658,2276" id="eSc_textblock_eb5ad774" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_7087fd61" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-gap reason="irrelevant" data-origname="gap" data-origatts="reason" data-empty=""/>>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_ffd3c78d" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    <tei-seg ana="#sitting_woman" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                        Woman sitting
                    </tei-seg>
                    in front of a device with buttons. In the background
                    a Welte grand.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e9d44931" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Remember that you can
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>select unlimited pro-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>gram groups for the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Musicalle</tei-name> from the in-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>comparable <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>MIGNON Library</tei-name> of over
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>three thousand Master
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Recordings . . .
            <tei-seg ana="#suit_every_mood" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                clas-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sical music,
                <tei-seg ana="#popular" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    modern
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>music
                </tei-seg>, orchestral music,
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-seg ana="#dance" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    ballets and dance ...
                </tei-seg>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>a program to suit every
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>mood and occasion.
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_4411276c" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The Amazing New
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-MIGNON Musicalle</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>makes possible for the first time an hour of uninter-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>rupted music by the great pianists of the world ..
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_8b4f9efa" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#touch_of_a_button" type="topic" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                At the touch of a button . . .
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>without moving from your chair . .
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_b142b74c" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>TURN BACK the calendar twenty-four
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>years . . . From the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">House of Welte</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>came the announcement in 1904 of an
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>instrument which
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                exactly reproduced the play-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing of the master pianists. . . .
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Today–twenty-four years later–the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">WELTE-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>MIGNON Corporation</tei-orgName> announces
            <tei-seg ana="#technical_invention" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                the second
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>truly great and signifact step in the progress
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of musical reproduction . . . the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>MIGNON Musicalle</tei-name>.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#sitting_woman" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>. . . A women relaxes in the soft depths of
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>her favorite chair . . . 
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#touch_of_a_button" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                On the table by her
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>side rests a small tablet with eight ivory but-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tons . . . She presses . . . From her
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>superb piano, a <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-MIGNON</tei-name>, flow the
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>magic strains of a <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Chopin</tei-persName> Nocturne . . .
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/118986724" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp">Paderewski</tei-persName> is playing . . . Silence for a mo-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ment . . . the silence of appreciation . . .
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>She touches another button, chossing at ran-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>dom . . . <tei-persName corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/11918625X" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp">Josef Hofmann</tei-persName>-playing
                <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Medels-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sohn's</tei-persName> "Rondo Capriccioso."
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#suit_every_mood" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                In modern mood
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>she turns to <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Gershwin</tei-persName> . . . "The Rhap-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>sody in Blue" . . .
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#listening" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                For an hour or more, she
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>revels in the worlds great piano music . . .
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>never moving from her chair
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>. . . . This is the new <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">WELTE-MIGNON
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Musicalle</tei-name> . . . . . . .
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_2aef91d9" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Such simplicity operation has never before
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>been achieved in musical reproduction.
            <tei-seg ana="#invisibility" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                Every
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>annoying interruption is banished . . . no
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>dials to turn . . . no rerolling . . .
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>no changing of records.
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Musicalle</tei-name> is a cabinet containing eight
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>records and the silent mechanism for control-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ling them.
            </tei-seg> It is connected with the piano by
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>a small, easily concealed cable. A tablet,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>scarcely larger than a small book of verse,
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>operates the <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Musicalle</tei-name>-resting inconspicuously
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>on a table or stand in your library . . .
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>your music room . . . your dining room
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>. . . wherever you wish.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Of course, there will be times when you
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>yourself desire to play. Remember that the
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Musicalle</tei-name> leaves your piano wholly at your
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>disposal-unaffected in appearance, action or
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>tone.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Musicalle</tei-name> together with <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Mechanism</tei-name> installed in other
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>makes of Grand Pianos. Prices on request.
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_eb5ad774" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    A closed cabinet.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_7d6330b8" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#immortality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                The New Instrument That Immortalizes the Playing of the Masters.
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">WELTE-MIGNON CORPORATION</tei-orgName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">
                <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">William C. Heaton</tei-hi>
            </tei-persName>, Wholesale Sales Manager, Piano Division
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                665
                Fifth Avenue
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>New York City
            </tei-address>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_5fe584b5" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Musicalle</tei-name> is patented and controlled ex-
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>clusively by the <tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Welte-Mignon Corporation</tei-orgName>
        </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
